programme.title: National Football League strike 1982
programme.short_synopsis: A pay dispute over NFL television rights, and an overview of the sport.
programme.medium_synopsis: The complex rules and tactics of American football, and how a pay dispute led to the 1982 strike by the players of the National Football League, as discussed by Alistair Cooke.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
